About Working With Me

What I Do

I help AI and automation companies cut through the noise and focus on growth tactics that actually move metrics. From product launches to customer acquisition, I build marketing systems that scale.

How I Work

  • • Quick 15-30 min discovery call to understand your goals
  • • Data-driven strategy with clear metrics and timelines
  • • Hands-on execution with weekly progress updates
  • • Flexible engagement from project-based to ongoing partnership

Response Time

I typically respond to new inquiries within 24 hours. For urgent projects, feel free to mention it in your message and I'll prioritize accordingly.
